ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team02

Class Accolade

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team02.Accolade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Accolade
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Accolade is an object that contains all the information about an individual accolade, including ID, type, threshold, name and description
    See Also:

        int threshold,
        int DorT,
        java.lang.String name,
        java.lang.String description)
        Constructor initializes the Accolade object
        Parameters:
        id - Accolade #
        threshold - value the user needs to reach to unlock it
        DorT - Daily vs Lifetime
        name - Name of accolade
        description - Description of accolade

        Returns:
        whether the user has unlocked the accolade (false if so, true if not)

        public boolean isVisible(Date userDate)
        Determines if user is viewing data from before they unlocked they accolade or not
        Parameters:
        userDate - date the user is currently viewing
        Returns:
        whether the badge should be visible on the accolade page
